points.title: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

case.title: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

points.title: You aren’t forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

case.title: You aren’t forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
case.description: Binding Arbitration is a dispute resolution method involving a neutral third party which will render a decision instead of going to court. Since the arbitrator can decide the outgoing of a dispute without evidences or a legal basis, it is preferable that users decide whether they want or not their dispute to be resolved this way.

points.title: You maintain ownership of your content

case.title: You maintain ownership of your content
case.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in France

case.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").

points.title: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites

case.title: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites
case.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its Terms of Service does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their Terms of Service.

points.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

case.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

case.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
case.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

points.title: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time

case.title: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time
case.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that may keep logs indefinitely, allowing user sessions to be tracked over time. Logs that are kept for a time "consistent with applicable law" also fall under this case, since this period of time may be murky or undefined.

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

case.title: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs
case.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.

points.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

case.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
case.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.

points.title: Your personal data is not sold

case.title: Your personal data is not sold
case.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

case.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
case.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

points.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

case.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
case.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

case.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

points.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

case.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
case.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.

points.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.

case.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.
case.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.

points.title: Tracking cookies refused will not limit your ability to use the service

case.title: Tracking cookies refused will not limit your ability to use the service
case.description: Blocking tracking technologies will not negatively impact your use of the service.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content

case.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
case.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.

points.title: Inconvenient process for obtaining personal data
points.analysis: You have to send a postal letter to request personal data, which may take a long time to arrive and is less practical that a simple email.

case.title: Inconvenient process for obtaining personal data
case.description: This applies to cases where obtaining personal data requires sending a written letter by mail or is otherwise more complicated and time consuming than necessary.

points.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

case.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
case.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
